title: WALL·E
description: In a distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will decide the fate of mankind.

title: Leon: The Professional
description: A professional hitman reluctantly takes in a 12-year-old girl after her family is murdered, forming an unlikely bond.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: With Spider-Man's identity revealed, Peter Parker seeks Doctor Strange’s help, leading to chaos in the multiverse.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
description: An aging laundromat owner discovers she must connect with versions of herself across parallel universes to save reality.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in buried gold.

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
description: An unhinged general triggers a nuclear crisis that only a war room full of politicians and generals can (maybe) stop.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
description: In 1930s Mississippi, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while being pursued by the law.

title: Amélie
description: A shy waitress in Paris sets out to improve the lives of those around her while grappling with her own isolation.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin seeks revenge on her ex-colleagues who betrayed her.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
description: A young warrior steals a legendary sword, setting off a chain of events involving forbidden love and betrayal.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A lone juror attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: The Rebels face attacks from the Empire while Luke Skywalker trains with Jedi Master Yoda to confront Darth Vader.

title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: A voyage to Jupiter with a sentient computer, HAL 9000, explores humanity’s place in the cosmos.
